thread.title: These Are the 20 US Cities with the Biggest Illegal Immigrant Populations
thread.title_full: These Are the 20 US Cities with the Biggest Illegal Immigrant Populations

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: These Are the 20 US Cities with the Biggest Illegal Immigrant Populations
text:
Illegal immigration is something that affects Americans more than they probably realize. 
It affects jobs, where your tax dollars go, crime, and a variety of other areas. 
Many people feel like it is an issue that doesn’t really apply to their community. 
That’s likely not true. 
Here is the list of the top 20 cities that are hardest hit by illegal immigration. 
The list itself is surprising, but do you notice a trend among the listed cities? The Washington Examiner reports that all but three of these cities are “sanctuary cities,” or cities with policies that shelter illegal immigrants. 
Interesting numbers. 
Do you live in one of these cities? 
Clearly, this is something that needs to be addressed and it’s baffling that the liberal media pretends otherwise. LIKE this article?
